PathOfBuilding.Notes:
VENDOR RECIPES:
Magic Helmet with +1 to Level of all Minion Skill Gems Normal Helmet 2 or more quality gems with a combined total of 40% quality & the Minion tag
--------- leveling: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acz9TAhiZ2I&t=112s
- he takes carnage chieftain spectres
---------
SPECTRES
big doc https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lQK2D03g8p2q7h1Hp5X3ni-pPt7ORNRQlpx1rFV0Os0/edit source https://www.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/u23x7x/personally_tested_100_different_rare_spectres/
- Hyrri's Watch: Legion - Frost Sentinel: Act 8
- Flame Sentinel : Act 3 MOONDANCERS -> from tota/ancestors :(
In order of preference for pure cold build caster spectres: - Snowcaller : AtlasExiles/EyrieArcticCrystal?? -> must be veritania influence (cold conqueror) - Mindweave Sentinel : LeagueSynthesis - Frost Auto-Scout : LeagueHeist - Frosal Synthete : LeagueSynthesis
